verses.text: Then \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w* to \w Gaza|strong="H5804"\w*, and \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* there an \w harlot|strong="H0802"\w*, and went \w in|strong="H0935"\w* unto her.\f + \fr 16.1 \ft harlot: Heb. a woman an harlot\f*

\add And it was told\add* the \w Gazites|strong="H5841"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w* is \w come|strong="H0935"\w* hither. And they compassed \add him\add* \w in|strong="H5437"\w*, and laid \w wait|strong="H0693"\w* for him all \w night|strong="H3915"\w* in the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and were \w quiet|strong="H2790"\w* all the \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, In the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, when it is \w day|strong="H0216"\w*, we shall \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* him.\f + \fr 16.2 \ft quiet: Heb. silence\f*

And \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w* \w lay|strong="H7901"\w* till \w midnight|strong="H2677"\w*, and \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* at \w midnight|strong="H2677"\w*, and \w took|strong="H0270"\w* the \w doors|strong="H1817"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w posts|strong="H4201"\w*, and went \w away|strong="H5265"\w* with them, \w bar|strong="H1280"\w* and all, and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \add them\add* upon his \w shoulders|strong="H3802"\w*, and carried them \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of an \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* that \add is\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*.\f + \fr 16.3 \ft bar…: Heb. with the bar\f*

¶ And it came to pass \w afterward|strong="H0310"\w*, that he \w loved|strong="H0157"\w* a \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* in the \w valley|strong="H5158"\w* of \w Sorek|strong="H7796"\w*, whose \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Delilah|strong="H1807"\w*.\f + \fr 16.4 \ft in…: or, by the brook\f*

And the \w lords|strong="H5633"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* unto her, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her, \w Entice|strong="H6601"\w* him, and \w see|strong="H7200"\w* wherein his \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* \add lieth\add*, and by what \add means\add* we may \w prevail|strong="H3201"\w* against him, that we may \w bind|strong="H0631"\w* him to \w afflict|strong="H6031"\w* him: and we will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* of us eleven \w hundred|strong="H0505"\w* \add pieces\add* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*.\f + \fr 16.5 \ft afflict: or, humble\f*

¶ And \w Delilah|strong="H1807"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w*, \w Tell|strong="H5046"\w* me, I pray thee, wherein thy \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* \add lieth\add*, and wherewith thou mightest be \w bound|strong="H0631"\w* to \w afflict|strong="H6031"\w* thee.

And \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her, If they \w bind|strong="H0631"\w* me with \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w green|strong="H3892"\w* \w withs|strong="H3499"\w* that were never \w dried|strong="H2717"\w*, then shall I be \w weak|strong="H2470"\w*, and be as \w another|strong="H0259"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w*.\f + \fr 16.7 \ft green…: or, new cords: Heb. moist\f*\f + \fr 16.7 \ft another: Heb. one\f*

Then the \w lords|strong="H5633"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* brought \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to her \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w green|strong="H3892"\w* \w withs|strong="H3499"\w* which had not been \w dried|strong="H2717"\w*, and she \w bound|strong="H0631"\w* him with them.\f + \fr 16.8 \ft green…: or, new cords: Heb. moist\f*

Now \add there were\add* men lying in \w wait|strong="H0693"\w*, \w abiding|strong="H3427"\w* with her in the \w chamber|strong="H2315"\w*. And she \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, The \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \add be\add* upon thee, \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w*. And he \w brake|strong="H5423"\w* the \w withs|strong="H3499"\w*, as a \w thread|strong="H6616"\w* of \w tow|strong="H5296"\w* is \w broken|strong="H5423"\w* when it \w toucheth|strong="H7306"\w* the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*. So his \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* was not \w known|strong="H3045"\w*.\f + \fr 16.9 \ft toucheth: Heb. smelleth\f*

And \w Delilah|strong="H1807"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w*, Behold, thou hast \w mocked|strong="H2048"\w* me, and \w told|strong="H1696"\w* me \w lies|strong="H3577"\w*: now \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* me, I pray thee, wherewith thou mightest be \w bound|strong="H0631"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her, If they \w bind|strong="H0631"\w* me \w fast|strong="H0631"\w* with \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w ropes|strong="H5688"\w* that never were \w occupied|strong="H4399"\w*, then shall I be \w weak|strong="H2470"\w*, and be as \w another|strong="H0259"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w*.\f + \fr 16.11 \ft that never…: Heb. wherewith work hath not been done\f*

\w Delilah|strong="H1807"\w* therefore \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w ropes|strong="H5688"\w*, and \w bound|strong="H0631"\w* him therewith, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, The \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \add be\add* upon thee, \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w*. And \add there were\add* liers in \w wait|strong="H0693"\w* \w abiding|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w chamber|strong="H2315"\w*. And he \w brake|strong="H5423"\w* them from off his \w arms|strong="H2220"\w* like a \w thread|strong="H2339"\w*.

And \w Delilah|strong="H1807"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w*, \w Hitherto|strong="H2008"\w* thou hast \w mocked|strong="H2048"\w* me, and \w told|strong="H1696"\w* me \w lies|strong="H3577"\w*: \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* me wherewith thou mightest be \w bound|strong="H0631"\w*. And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her, If thou \w weavest|strong="H0707"\w* the \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w locks|strong="H4253"\w* of my \w head|strong="H7218"\w* with the \w web|strong="H4545"\w*.

And she \w fastened|strong="H8628"\w* \add it\add* with the \w pin|strong="H3489"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, The \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \add be\add* upon thee, \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w*. And he \w awaked|strong="H3364"\w* out of his \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w*, and went \w away|strong="H5265"\w* with the \w pin|strong="H3489"\w* of the \w beam|strong="H0708"\w*, and with the \w web|strong="H4545"\w*.

¶ And she \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w How|strong="H0349"\w* canst thou \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, I \w love|strong="H0157"\w* thee, when thine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \add is\add* not with me? thou hast \w mocked|strong="H2048"\w* me these \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w*, and hast not \w told|strong="H5046"\w* me wherein thy \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* \add lieth\add*.

And it came to pass, when she \w pressed|strong="H6693"\w* him \w daily|strong="H3117"\w* with her \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, and \w urged|strong="H0509"\w* him, \add so\add* that his \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* was \w vexed|strong="H7114"\w* unto \w death|strong="H4191"\w*;\f + \fr 16.16 \ft vexed: Heb. shortened\f*

That he \w told|strong="H5046"\w* her all his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her, There hath not \w come|strong="H5927"\w* a \w razor|strong="H4177"\w* upon mine \w head|strong="H7218"\w*; for I \add have been\add* a \w Nazarite|strong="H5139"\w* unto \w God|strong="H0430"\w* from my \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w womb|strong="H0990"\w*: if I be \w shaven|strong="H1548"\w*, then my \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* will \w go|strong="H5493"\w* from me, and I shall become \w weak|strong="H2470"\w*, and be like any \add other\add* \w man|strong="H0120"\w*.

And when \w Delilah|strong="H1807"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that he had \w told|strong="H5046"\w* her all his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, she \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* and \w called|strong="H7121"\w* for the \w lords|strong="H5633"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* this \w once|strong="H6471"\w*, for he hath \w shewed|strong="H5046"\w* me all his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*. Then the \w lords|strong="H5633"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* unto her, and \w brought|strong="H5927"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* in their \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

And she made him \w sleep|strong="H3462"\w* upon her \w knees|strong="H1290"\w*; and she \w called|strong="H7121"\w* for a \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, and she caused him to shave \w off|strong="H1548"\w* the \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w locks|strong="H4253"\w* of his \w head|strong="H7218"\w*; and she \w began|strong="H2490"\w* to \w afflict|strong="H6031"\w* him, and his \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* \w went|strong="H5493"\w* from him.

And she \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \add be\add* upon thee, \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w*. And he \w awoke|strong="H3364"\w* out of his \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I will go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* as at other times \w before|strong="H6471"\w*, and \w shake|strong="H5287"\w* myself. And he \w wist|strong="H3045"\w* not that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was \w departed|strong="H5493"\w* from him.

¶ But the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w took|strong="H0270"\w* him, and put \w out|strong="H5365"\w* his \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, and brought him \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to \w Gaza|strong="H5804"\w*, and \w bound|strong="H0631"\w* him with fetters of \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*; and he did \w grind|strong="H2912"\w* in the \w prison|strong="H0631"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.\f + \fr 16.21 \ft put out: Heb. bored out\f*

Howbeit the \w hair|strong="H8181"\w* of his \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w began|strong="H2490"\w* to grow \w again|strong="H6779"\w* \w after|strong="H0834"\w* he was \w shaven|strong="H1548"\w*.\f + \fr 16.22 \ft after…: or, as when he was shaven\f*

Then the \w lords|strong="H5633"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* gathered them \w together|strong="H0622"\w* for to \w offer|strong="H2076"\w* a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* unto \w Dagon|strong="H1712"\w* their \w god|strong="H0430"\w*, and to \w rejoice|strong="H8057"\w*: for they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Our \w god|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w* our \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w* into our \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

And when the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* him, they \w praised|strong="H1984"\w* their \w god|strong="H0430"\w*: for they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Our \w god|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* into our \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* our \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*, and the \w destroyer|strong="H2717"\w* of our \w country|strong="H0776"\w*, which \w slew|strong="H2491"\w* \w many|strong="H7235"\w* of us.\f + \fr 16.24 \ft which…: Heb. and who multiplied our slain\f*

And it came to pass, when their \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w* were \w merry|strong="H2896"\w*, that they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Call|strong="H7121"\w* for \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w*, that he may make us \w sport|strong="H7832"\w*. And they \w called|strong="H7121"\w* for \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w* out of the \w prison|strong="H0631"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; and he made \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w sport|strong="H6711"\w*: and they \w set|strong="H5975"\w* him between the \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w*.\f + \fr 16.25 \ft them: Heb. before them\f*

And \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w lad|strong="H5288"\w* that \w held|strong="H2388"\w* him by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w Suffer|strong="H3240"\w* me that I may \w feel|strong="H4184"\w* the \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* whereupon the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w standeth|strong="H3559"\w*, that I may \w lean|strong="H8172"\w* upon them.

Now the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* was \w full|strong="H4390"\w* of \w men|strong="H0582"\w* and \w women|strong="H0802"\w*; and all the \w lords|strong="H5633"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \add were\add* there; and \add there were\add* upon the \w roof|strong="H1406"\w* about \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* and \w women|strong="H0802"\w*, that \w beheld|strong="H7200"\w* while \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w* made \w sport|strong="H7832"\w*.

And \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*, \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* me, I pray thee, and \w strengthen|strong="H2388"\w* me, I pray thee, only this \w once|strong="H6471"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, that I may be at \w once|strong="H0259"\w* \w avenged|strong="H5358"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* for my \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.

And \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w* took \w hold|strong="H3943"\w* of the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w middle|strong="H8432"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* upon which the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w stood|strong="H3559"\w*, and on which it was borne \w up|strong="H5564"\w*, of the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* with his right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, and of the \w other|strong="H0259"\w* with his \w left|strong="H8040"\w*.\f + \fr 16.29 \ft on which…: or, he leaned on them\f*

And \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Let me \w die|strong="H4191"\w* with the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*. And he \w bowed|strong="H5186"\w* himself with \add all his\add* \w might|strong="H3581"\w*; and the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* upon the \w lords|strong="H5633"\w*, and upon all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add were\add* therein. So the \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* which he \w slew|strong="H4191"\w* at his \w death|strong="H4194"\w* were \w more|strong="H7227"\w* than \add they\add* which he \w slew|strong="H4191"\w* in his \w life|strong="H2416"\w*.\f + \fr 16.30 \ft me: Heb. my soul\f*

Then his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* and all the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* came \w down|strong="H3381"\w*, and \w took|strong="H5375"\w* him, and brought \add him\add* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, and \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* him between \w Zorah|strong="H6881"\w* and \w Eshtaol|strong="H0847"\w* in the \w buryingplace|strong="H6913"\w* of \w Manoah|strong="H4495"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*. And he \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.
